verbs.description: WASHINGTON TOWNSHIP , Michigan -- [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: told] [ARG2: supporters] [ARGM-LOC: at a speech] [ARGM-TMP: on Saturday] [ARG1: that if Congress did not meet his funding demands for border security , he may support a government shutdown this fall] .

WASHINGTON TOWNSHIP , Michigan -- President Donald Trump told supporters at a speech on Saturday that if Congress [V: did] not meet his funding demands for border security , he may support a government shutdown this fall .

WASHINGTON TOWNSHIP , Michigan -- President Donald Trump told supporters at a speech on Saturday that if [ARG0: Congress] did [ARGM-NEG: not] [V: meet] [ARG1: his funding demands for border security] , he may support a government shutdown this fall .

WASHINGTON TOWNSHIP , Michigan -- President Donald Trump told supporters at a speech on Saturday that if Congress did not meet his funding demands for border security , he [V: may] support a government shutdown this fall .

WASHINGTON TOWNSHIP , Michigan -- President Donald Trump told supporters at a speech on Saturday that [ARGM-ADV: if Congress did not meet his funding demands for border security] , [ARG0: he] [ARGM-MOD: may] [V: support] [ARG1: a government shutdown] [ARGM-TMP: this fall] .
